content: How many tadpole definitions am I allowed?
You are allowed to create a maximum of 5 tadpole definition templates.
What's the maximum number of data points allowed per curve?
Based on Document 2, the maximum number of columns (data points) allowed per curve is 450.

I want to add this name as my curve shade name length "Hydrocarbon bearing zone highlighted"

The operation is not allowed due to the character length constraint, as the chosen name "Hydrocarbon bearing zone highlighted" has a length of 37 characters, exceeding the allowed limit of 20 characters.
